name: printsync3d-root
description: Common packages and scripts for both projects.
author: Alan BuriÄ‡

scripts.setup: npm ci && concurrently "cd backend && npm ci" "cd frontend && npm ci"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build:tsc" "cd frontend && npm run build-only"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:tsc" "cd frontend && npm run preview"
